titleStmt.title: Exceeding joyfull nevvs from Scotland: wherin is declared the great willingesse [sic] of the Lords & Commons in Scotland, to aid the Parliament of England against the cavaliers and prelaticall enemies of this kingdome. Whereunto is anexed a fit parralell between England and Scotland, manifestly declaring the parity and equallity of their precedent distempers, and our present troubles, occasioned by the selfe same party of court parasits, papists, prelats and projectors.

publicationStmt.publisher: Sept. 13. London, Printed for T. Rider,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
